Class OplElection

  • java.lang.Object
    • OplElection
  • public class OplElection
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to run and hold the methods needed for an OPL Election.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected java.util.ArrayList<Candidate> candidates
      An ArrayList to hold the candidates before being assigned to the Party objects.
      protected int numBallots
      The total number ballots that were cast during an election.
      protected int numCandidates
      The number of candidates running in an election.
      protected int numSeats
      The total number of seats available to be won.
      protected int numValidBallots
      The total number of valid ballots cast.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<Candidate> winners
      An ArrayList containing the candidate(s) who won a seat.

    • Method Detail

      • runElection

        public void runElection()
        Runs an OPL Election, calling methods to parse the input file and to assign seats.

      • assignBallots

        protected void assignBallots​(java.lang.String line)
        Method used to read through a ballot and assign it to the correct candidate. A Ballot object is created and added to an ArrayList in Candidate
        Parameters:
        line - A String containing information from the ballot

      • processFile

        protected void processFile()
        Parses through the election file from and assigns the information in it accordingly. Contains information saying what the election is, how many candidates there are, the names of the candidates and what party the belong to, how many seats are available, how many total ballots were cast, and all of the ballots themselves.

      • getFile

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.io.File> getFile()
        Returns:
        The election files.

      • getQuota

        public int getQuota()
        Returns:
        The quota of the election.

      • getParties

        Returns:
        The ArrayList of all the parties in the election.

      • getWinners

        Returns:

      • getCandidates

        All of the candidates in the election.

      • flipCoin

        public static int flipCoin​(int numEquals)
        Used to break ties that happen in the election. Generates a random int to decide between however many choices.
        Parameters:
        numEquals - The amount of things that are tied.
        Returns:
        A random int between 0 and numEquals inclusively.
